snippet.title: Twisty Planets - iOS / Android - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Twisty Planets: http://goo.gl/L3dDn6
Twisty Planets By Crescent Moon Games
Please Subscribe for more videos ► http://goo.gl/6JFyIl
Free Online Games, Gameplay and Walkthrough!

****************************************­************************************
Follow me on twitter and Facebook!
►https://www.facebook.com/ArcadeGo
►https://twitter.com/arcadego
►https://plus.google.com/111034953444824724633
►http://www.youtube.com/user/ArcadeGo
****************************************­************************************
'Twisty Planets is a welcoming puzzle-platformer that's as smart as it is fun.' Pocket Gamer 8/10

'Twisty Planets by Crescent Moon Games is an addictive puzzle platformer that is unlike anything you've seen before on iOS.' App Advice

Welcome to Twisty Planets - a unique 3D puzzle game unlike any other. Help little fella Qub escape the twisty planets, find stars to open portal and escape! Navigate springboards, moving platforms and teleports to find the way out of the 3D planets. Watch out for the edges and don't fall off! Can you find a way off the planets and into the next galaxy?

For devices iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPod 5 and later.

Check the awesome graphics and gameplay in the trailer
http://www.motion.ee/TwistyPlanetsTrailer.html

Features:
• Awesome 3D graphics & game experience
• 60 mind twisting levels
• 3 different galaxies to explore
• Unique 3D puzzle gameplay
• Intuitive touch controls
• Achievements, leaderboards, Rewards and more
• Hidden objects, Rewards and Easter eggs... keep discovering!

Developed by FirstSight Games
facebook.com/FirstSightGames

Published by Crescent Moon Games
crescentmoongames.com
